definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">entity_dies</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_entity_compare"><field name="entity">EntityBlaze</field><value name="compareTo"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_ternary_op" inline="false"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" mark="false"></mutation><value name="condition"><block type="math_binary_ops" inline="false"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_random_int_between" inline="false"><value name="min"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="max"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">50</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><value name="THEN"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value><value name="ELSE"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="spawn_gem"><field name="despawn">FALSE</field><value name="block"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:BlazeSoul</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="pickUpDelay"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">10</field></block></value></block></statement></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
